name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程旨在透過時事新聞，提高學生之英文閱聽能力。教材將取自國外英文報紙新聞、電視新聞、雜誌新聞與網路新聞等。透過對多元主題之新聞英文的解析，讓學生瞭解單字用法、句形結構、特殊術語、慣用俚語等，提升閱讀能力。另外藉由播放實際新聞英語內容，配合聽力技巧的學習，提升理解能力。本課程特別著重英文閱讀、聽力與口說能力，鼓勵學生以英文討論國際時事，發表見解，拓展對世界的認識。
schedule:
WEEK	SESSION THEME
1	Introduction
2	Introduction to Journalism: Print Media and Broadcast Media 
3     	Politics I: At home and abroad
4     	Politics II: At home and abroad
5     	Politics III: At home and abroad
6	Arts and Entertainment I
7    	Break/Arts and Entertainment II
8    	In-class Midterm 
9    	Campus-wide English Proficiency Test 
10    	Business and Finance I
11    	Business and Finance II
12   	Health and Medicine
13   	Science and Technology
14   	Travel and living
15   	Sports 
16   	Group presentation I
17   	Group presentation II/In-class Final
18   	Campus-wide English Proficiency Test
